name: 郭政淳
objective:
此課程旨在協助學生建立相當於美國大學入學測驗的高階字彙，亦即相當於接受高等教育之英語系國家人士所具備的用字能力。此課程將通過故事方式介紹此類字彙，其中也包括字形學之解析。學生修習此課程後應能將高階字彙使用於正確的上下文中，因此可達成下列諸目的：
"　　提昇高階字彙數量
"　　加強英文閱讀能力
"　　習得重要字源解析
"　　避上下文中的用字錯誤
"　　提高英語表達能力
"　　加強英文寫作能力
"　　精進英語文溝通技巧
This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals:
"　　Develop a powerful vocabulary
"　　Improve reading skills
"　　Learn important word roots
"　　Avoid word usage error in context
"　　Become a better speaker
"　　Strengthen his/her writing ability
"　　Improve communication skills
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction
Week 2 Learning Vocabulary through different genres: Demo (I); sub-/super- words
Week 3 Learning Vocabulary through different genres: Demo (II); pre-/post- words
Week 4 Student-led tutorial (I); bene-/mal- words
Week 5 Student-led tutorial (II); ante-/anti- words
Week 6 Student-led tutorial (III); bi-/mono- words (To be rescheduled)
Week 7 Student-led tutorial (IV); bio-/gen- words
Week 8 Student-led tutorial (V); anthrop-/morph- words
Week 9 Midterm Exam; Recitation Practice
Week 10 Midterm Evaluation 
Week 11 Student-led tutorial (VI); graph-/gram-/scrib- words
Week 12 Student-led tutorial (VII); cred-/ver-/fid- words
Week 13 Student-led tutorial (VIII); cogn-/gnos-/-logy words
Week 14 Student-led tutorial (IX); circum-/vert- words
Week 15 Student-led tutorial (X); log-/dict- words
Week 16 Make-up tutorials; (Academic Word List Overview) 
Week 17 Recitation Competition
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Class Activity 15%
Quizzes 30%
Student-led tutorials: 10%
Recitation: 15%
Exams: 30%

Friend et al. 2007. The Least You Should Know about Vocabulary Building. Wadsworth Cengage Learning.
